title: Bobrůvka (Žďár nad Sázavou District)
text:
Bobrůvka is a village and municipality ("<a href="obec">obec</a>") in <a href="%C5%BD%C4%8F%C3%A1r%20nad%20S%C3%A1zavou%20District">Žďár nad Sázavou District</a> in the <a href="Vyso%C4%8Dina%20Region">Vysočina Region</a> of the Czech Republic.
The municipality covers an area of , and has a population of 230 (as at 28 August 2006).
Bobrůvka lies approximately south-east of <a href="%C5%BD%C4%8F%C3%A1r%20nad%20S%C3%A1zavou">Žďár nad Sázavou</a>, east of <a href="Jihlava">Jihlava</a>, and south-east of <a href="Prague">Prague</a>.
